annonsrubrik: Cyber Security Risk Analyst - Connectivity/Connected Platforms
annonstext:
As a consultant at Altran, you are part of something bigger. In multidisciplinary teams you make your contribution to the most innovative products in the high-tech, automotive, telecom, defence, aerospace and healthcare industries. All our projects, whether in-house or at our leading customers, are part of our ambition of making life more advanced, more sustainable and easier. Altran offers you a work environment branded by ambition and care. You will be working with cutting edge technology, developing yourself surrounded by dedicated colleagues with high expertise.

Responsibility include the following:

To lead and organize the Risk Identification and analysis Processes of connectivity Platform /Products and Applications

Gather relevant information regarding the risks and threads

Identify, Analyse and quantify risks using appropriate methodology

Document the identified risks in a coherent and accessible manner

Good with Communications skills when communicating with risk owners and in risk governance forums

Collaboration skills when it comes to definition of high-level security requirements and goals.

Actively play a role in research and development of new methods and techniques/ tools to improve risk management

Create pedagogical overviews to highlight important details for stakeholders of varying technical knowledge.

Self-motivated, and good at prioritizing and planning your work. Good networking- and communication skills

Present reports to appropriate audiences (i.e. technical vs. non-technical staff)

Qualifications

• Knowledge of core cyber security principles and properties for system-level design.

• B.Sc. or M.Sc. degree in a relevant field, e.g. information security, cyber security, systems engineering or equivalent experience.

• 3+ years of working experience from an information security, or product cyber security related discipline (i.e. within IoT, Healthcare, Industrial controls, defence, etc.).

• Experience with cyber security threat modelling methods / tools.

• Good networking and communication skills with the ability to present and persuade appropriately.

• Fluent communication in English (written and verbal).

Benefits when working with us:

• Caring and ambitious workplace

• Altran Academy - Your competence platform

• Collective agreement

• Advantage of a global company with your mobility program

• Competitive healthcare compensation

• Hundreds of benefits on your benefit portal

Are you the one we are looking for? 

Please apply through the website, www.altran.com, or send your application to FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Talent Acquisition Partner, at  EMAIL  or Deepak Vastare, Team Manager, at  EMAIL . 

Looking forward to recieve your application!
